refsect1.title: Default style schemes
refsect1.para: The libgedit-gtksourceview team prefers to just keep a small number of style schemes distributed with the library. To add a new style scheme in libgedit-gtksourceview itself, the style scheme must be very popular, and ideally a libgedit-gtksourceview-based application must use it by default.
